v-model:loading.description: Whether it is in the loading state, and the 'load' event is not triggered during the loading process
v-model:loading.description_zh: 是否处于加载状态，加载过程中不触发 `load` 事件

v-model:error.description: Whether the loading fails, click the error prompt after the loading failure to retrigger the 'load' event
v-model:error.description_zh: 是否加载失败，加载失败后点击错误提示可以重新触发 `load` 事件

:finished.description: Whether the load is complete, the 'load' event will no longer be triggered after the load is completed
:finished.description_zh: 是否已加载完成，加载完成后不再触发 `load` 事件

offset.description: The 'load' event is triggered when the distance between the scrollbar and the bottom is less than the offset
offset.description_zh: 滚动条与底部距离小于 offset 时触发 `load` 事件

loading-text.description: Prompt copy during the loading process
loading-text.description_zh: 加载过程中的提示文案

finished-text.description: Prompt copy after loading is complete
finished-text.description_zh: 加载完成后的提示文案

error-text.description_zh: 加载失败后的提示文案

immediate-check.description: Whether the scroll position check is performed immediately upon initialization
immediate-check.description_zh: 是否在初始化时立即执行滚动位置检查

direction.description: The scroll triggers the direction of loading, optionally up
direction.description_zh: 滚动触发加载的方向，可选值为 up

methods.name: check
methods.description: Check the current scroll position, and if you have scrolled to the bottom, a load event will be triggered
methods.description_zh: 检查当前的滚动位置，若已滚动至底部，则会触发 load 事件

events.name: load
events.description: Triggered when the distance between the scrollbar and the bottom is less than offset
events.description_zh: 滚动条与底部距离小于 offset 时触发

slots.name: loading
slots.description_zh: 自定义底部加载中提示

slots.name: finished
slots.description: Customize the prompt copy after the load is complete
slots.description_zh: 自定义加载完成后的提示文案

slots.name: error
slots.description: Customize the prompt text after loading failures
slots.description_zh: 自定义加载失败后的提示文案
